title: Stickerz Splatana Stamper
paragraphs: The Stickerz Splatana Stamper is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is an Emberz-branded version of the Splatana Stamper.
The Stickerz Splatana Stamper looks like the Splatana Stamper, but the handle is bright yellow and the blade is darker with stickers on it, including the Emberz logo.
The Stickerz Splatana Stamper was released as part of the Splatlands Collection on 12 June 2025. Its kit is Autobomb and Booyah Bomb.

The word stickerz is a stylized spelling of the word stickers.
